RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALHALLA AIR BASE bore in at the start bumping hard with FLYING GUILLOTINE, set all the pace, shook clear entering the stretch and won under strong encouragement. KHOPILOT bore out at the start bumping BAS LITTLE BEAST, chase the winner along the inside into the stretch, shifted out to the five path and held on for second. K P SILVER BULLET close outside, finished with good courage in the six path. JOYFUL CANDY chased the winner two wide and faded late. BAD LITTLE BEAST was bounced around between rivals at the start, squeezed, moved closer along the rail nearing the top of the stretch then leveled off. FLYING GUILLOTINE was bumped hard and squeezed at the start then trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Khopilot
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, chased inside, drifted 5path, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Little Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, middle move, inside, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Guillotine
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Valhalla Air Base
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, led throughout, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Joyful Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: K P Silver Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: close outside, finished well 6path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT unhurried early, closed with a rush in the six path through deep stretch under a hand ride and got up in the final strides. SUGAR LOVES IT sprinted to the lead shortly after the start, set the pace under pressure early, shook well clear when put to right handed urging entering the stretch and just missed hanging on. MAP TO MY HEART bumped soon after the start, pressured the winner two wide into the turn then faded in the stretch. DEE'S KY WILDCAT hopped at the start then bumped a few strides later, trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals. OH EYE SEE close up along the inside early, lacked the needed response. WICKED REESE stalked the pace three wide and was through after a half. JUPITER ECLIPSE was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Loves It
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Dominique's Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed with a rush, 6path, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Eye See
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Map to My Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, bumped, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Reese
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Jupiter Eclipse
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 15. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAT DADDY pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and prevailed under left handed urging. CALL WEST trailed into the stretch, rallied determinedly five wide and finished clear for second. ROCK ON KITTEN bobbled at the start, chased the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted to the fie path and was outfinished. KHALFANI went evenly. PLATINUM MAC away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. KEYED ON TOP had good early speed then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Keyed On Top
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, start, chased 2 wide, drifted 5path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Mac
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Khalfani
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, 5 wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Purse 41500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 15 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUGIE D ORO bobbled out of the gate in front, was allowed to settle, chased a rapid pace in the four path into the turn, drifted to the six path while making the lead entering the stretch, was righted, quickly drew clear when put to a left handed whip and drew off under confident handling. MORESTRIDE never far back, improved position three wide on the turn, dug in late in the six path and finished second best. HIP HIP HOORAY never far back, finished with good courage two wide. LIBERATE was hustled to the lead soon after the start, set a fast along the inside pace for a half then was outfinished. DUKE OF DARKNESS chased the pace from the three path, swung wide entering the stretch and was weakened. ALTISSIMO trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Darkness
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3path, swung wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Liberate
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Lewis Michael and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set fast pace inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Hip Hip Hooray
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Altissimo
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Morestride
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 6path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Dougie D Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, chased, drifted 6path top lane, righted, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STONE COLD CAT unhurried early, closed willingly through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. JUDGE HEAD vied for the lead three wide, loomed boldly in the six path near mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner. CLASSIC MO away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide, drifted to the five path entering the stretch, dug in gamely but was outfinished. SPIN DOCTOR stalked the pace four wide, surged in the seven path in upper stretch and was outfinished. DEER CREEK ROAD trailed early, swung wide and closed some ground late. REANIMATE had good early sped along the inside then failed to respond. MUSTANG WILLIE was no factor. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA bobbled a few strides out of the gate, pressed the early pace along the rail and was through after a half. PLATE IT UP was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Reanimate
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Cold Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly 9path, left handed urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, pressed pace rail, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mustang Willie
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, drifted 5p, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, bid upper stretch, 7path, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY PINK BUNNY TALE away alertly, set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from HERE COMES DOLLY in upper stretch and proved best under strong handling. HERE COMES DOLLY never far back, surged three wide through the turn, drew on even terms for the lead outside the winner before the furlong marker then was denied while well clear for second. DOMINUS O'S ME saved ground and finished well clear for third. LADYBUGGIN chased the pace two wide into the turn then weakened. AUGMENTING ASSETS trailed outside and passed tiring rivals. PENNY'S TREASURE rushed to contention along the rail before a quarter, had speed for a half then was used up. SEE YA SISTA was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Penny's Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed contention rail, through after half, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Bunny Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, repulsed bid, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Ladybuggin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Dolly
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, quick move 3 wide, turn, drew even, denied

ENTRY.NAME: See Ya Sista
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Augmenting Assets
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed outside, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce March 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RENO TOUCH stalked the pace along the inside into the turn, shifted three wide near the quarter pole, rallied to make the lead at the furlong marker and prevailed under mild urging. INCESSANT dueled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then finished second best and returned bleeding from the nostrils. MAMBO DANCER battled for the lead two wide into the stretch and faded late. MAGICGIRL unhurried early, found her best stride late between horses. SPECIAL BEACH with the second flight two wide, went evenly. CHARGINA was no factor. BLUSHING BETTY offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Chargina
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Magicgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late, between horses,

ENTRY.NAME: Special Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Reno Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, altered course 3 wide 1/4 pole, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Incessant
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, second best, bled,

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PULPIT'S PURRFECT stalked the pace into the stretch, rallied three wide under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. COMMAND STRIKE sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. PASSIONFORTREASURE trailed into the turn then closed fast along the rail through deep stretch. LIONISTIC pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. PURITY with the second flight two wide, dropped inside on the turn then faded. SCATERRA with the second flight inside, weakened on the turn. VACATION SECRET was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Command Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, edged clear late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Vacation Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Passionfortreasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast rail

ENTRY.NAME: Scaterra
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Purity
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, angled in turn, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Pulpit's Purrfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, left handed urging, up in time
